reviewText: This is a great movie for kids. Good messages on the main lesson and others, I think there's about 5 short stories on here.
We love the episodes on this DVD.  Would prefer if episodes were listed in the details to make choosing a DVD easier.
This is a good toddler show that is fun, entertaining, yet has little lessons on being appreciated and saying thank you to people around you that do little to big things that are special.

We have read these books for a couple of years now and son loves them. So when we were looking for a new dvd for him. I thought lets try this. He absolutely loves this the Berenstain bears mind there manners dvd. Can't wait to get others.  While it's not exactly like the books, of course they had to change it slightly for the movies. It is very close to the books. They do have messages in there stories so the kids get a sense of what is right and wrong. I would recommend these to everyone. These are great for boys or girls.

My 4yo daughter and 6yo son enjoyed watching the whole DVD. It was an easy way as a parent to reinforce manners without harassing them. Great edutainment and a good reminder for parents to set the example and use their manners too! Also, it was great when my daughter wanted a toy and I reminded her about the "Gimmies" and she was quiet after that!!
My daughter loves to watch the Berenstain Bears. They are hard to find on TV, so this video is great. It plays coninuously, so it is great for the car too.

Super, super buy for kids!  You cannot beat the bears for entertainment. They demonstrate making good choices, put forth in an entertaining and funny way. The video is good quality reproductions of the former PBD series, and has 6 episodes:
Get the Gimmies
Say Please and Thank You
Mighty Milton
The Big Blooper
Papa's Pizza
Double Dare

My kids love the bears and learn manners, sharing, etc from watching these cartoons! This particular DVD came with a different DVD case picture but with the same episodes as seen in this product that Amazon sells. I highly recommend buying these shows and their books as well for your children!
very lovely and helpful for getting good ideas through.
I have this DVD at school to use as a teaching tool. Students enjoy watching them for "fun" during lunch or another unstructured time. They include good lessons for the children.

My 3 year old grand daughter enjoys Berenstein Bears books so the videos are a treat. The segments are short enough to hold attention and the subject matter is relevant. The lessons in the plots are valid without being preachy.

The DVD's arrived on time and in great shape. The stories are teaching my students while entertaining them. I am using the programs with my behavior disordered students and I am enjoying watching my student remember the lessons and discussing what happened and/or what should have been done differently.  Berenstain Bears are WONDERFUL lesson starters. Thank You!

The tape arrived on time and in great shape. The stories are teaching my students while entertaining them. I am using the programs with my behavior disordered students and I am enjoying watching my student remember the lessons and discussing what happened and/or what should have been done differently. Thank You!
This has a lot of good teachable stories about the impact of manners.  They of course came out some time ago.  I'm glad I can share them with my children.

You can't go wrong purchasing a Berenstain Bears video!  The videos teach children how they should and shouldn't act!  So many shows these days are full of adult humor or sarcasm (which young children do not understand).  I HIGHLY recommend this video and all the Berenstain Bear videos!!

My son and niece (both six) love this video ~ entertaining and educational.  My son has high functioning autism and the social stories here have really helped him interact with others.

The episodes include:

Get the Gimmies
Say Please and Thank You
The Big Blooper
Papa's Pizza
Mighty Milton
Double Dare
